name: User
description: The user.

name: Single tile
description: A single tile directly in front of the user.

name: Two-tile column
description: Two tiles in a column in front of the user.

name: Three-tile column
description: Three tiles in a column in front of the user.

name: Adjacent diamond
description: The four tiles adjacent to the user.

name: Adjacent ring
description: Eight tiles in a ring around the user.

name: Row
description: Three tiles in a line centered directly in front of the user.

name: Chevron
description: Three tiles in the shape of a chevron (^), with the apex two tiles in front of the user.

name: Plus
description: Five tiles in a plus shape centered two tiles in front of the user.

name: X-shape
description: Five tiles in an X shape centered directly in front of the user.

name: Two ahead
description: A single tile two tiles in front of the user.

name: Three ahead
description: A single tile three tiles in front of the user.

name: Diamond two ahead
description: Four tiles in a diamond centered two tiles in front of the user.

name: Ring in front
description: Eight tiles in a ring centered two tiles in front of the user.

name: Row two ahead
description: Three tiles in a line centered two tiles in front of the user.

name: Two rows two ahead
description: Six tiles in two rows of three, one centered two tiles in front of the user and the other three tiles.

name: Column two ahead
description: A column of two tiles starting two tiles in front of the user.

name: X-shape two ahead
description: Five tiles in an X shape centered two tiles in front of the user.

name: Dai
description: Seven tiles in the shape of the kanji å¤§ (dai), consisting of five squares in a plus shape in front of the user and one square on either side of the user.

name: T-shape
description: Four tiles in the shape of a T, consisting of the tile directly in front of the user and a row of three tiles centered two tiles in front of the user.

name: Two rows
description: Six tiles in two rows of three, one centered directly in front of the user and the other two tiles in front of the user.
